no-quest-available-desc: I didn't need your help right now.
no-quest-active-desc: I didn't remember having a quest with you.
dialogue-main-axel-firstmeet: Welcome {playername}, you are the creation of Tobias ... a Seraph right ?
dialogue-main-axel-firstmeet2: Right, I can see that your lost. So here it's Orario, the capital, and also a fortified city.
dialogue-main-axel-firstmeet3: Well, if other places experienced the Apocalypse like we did, they must be in a sorry state.
dialogue-main-axel-fmresponse3: All right, how can I get out of the fortified city ?
dialogue-main-axel-firstmeet4: Impatient, I see. Go to the bakery, Marie seems to have some stock to give away. Then head west towards the guard post.
dialogue-main-axel-hasnotmetmarie: No, I can't find it. Could you help me ?
dialogue-main-axel-welcomeback: Hi, so how's your adventure going ?
dialogue-main-axel-aidemarie: Marie is on the first street on the left when you head west.
dialogue-main-marie-firstmeet: Hello, my name is Marie and I am one of the bakers at Orario.
dialogue-main-marie-fmresponse: A little bird told me you had bread for adventurers.
dialogue-main-marie-firstmeet2:
An adventurer ?
Interesting, I didn't know people could survive the Apocalypse outside the walls.
dialogue-main-marie-fmresponse2: Everyone talks about the Apocalypse, but what is it ?
dialogue-main-marie-firstmeet3: Oh, that would be too long a story, and you have a world to travel. Here, take this bag of bread.
dialogue-main-marie-fmresponse3: Do you have any advice for me ?
dialogue-main-marie-firstmeet4:
Head towards the West Wall and into the red house on the right. Before you exit, you will find a former mercenary.
He will be able to give you some useful information and a few basic items.
dialogue-main-marie-fmresponse4: Ooh, thank you, I'll go right now!
dialogue-main-marie-meetjohn: So, did you find the mercenary's house ?
dialogue-main-marie-hasnotmetjohn: I'm a little bit lost can you show me again ?
dialogue-main-marie-aidejohn: John is just before the guard post near the west gate. It's a red house!
dialogue-main-marie-welcomeback: So, explorer, isn't the world magnificent?
dialogue-main-marie-wbresponse: Yes, the adventure of this world is magnificent!
dialogue-main-marie-opentrade: Yes! But what kind of bread or pastries do you have?
dialogue-main-john-firstmeet: ... ... ... What do you want from me ?
dialogue-main-john-fmresponse: Excuse me? Are you a mercenary ?
dialogue-main-john-firstmeet2: Ancien mercenaire, mais cela ne me dit en rien ta présence ici.
dialogue-main-john-fmresponse2:
C'est Marie.
La boulangère qui ma envoyer ici pour que vous m'aidiez à explorer le monde.
dialogue-main-john-firstmeet3:
Mmmpf. Bien, fait attention aux monstres dehors, il existe quatres grande classes de monstres :
Les rodeurs petits et lents ils peuvent te lancer des cailloux ou t'attaquer avec leurs bras.
dialogue-main-john-firstmeet4:
Les arcracheurs, ce sont des monstres qui attaquent de loin, ils lancent des sortes de flèche en os et
éviteront toujours le combat rapproché. Cependant, si tu t'en approche trop ils t'attaqueront avec leurs tête.
dialogue-main-john-fmresponse4: Je vois et pour l'avant dernier ?
dialogue-main-john-firstmeet5:
Ensuite, ce sont les Frissonneur, ce sont les plus dangereux de la surface à mon goût.
Ils courent plus vite que l'être lambda et n'abandonneront pas leurs courses tant qu'ils ne t'auront pas tuer.
dialogue-main-john-firstmeet6:
Le dernier ! C'est la famille des locustes ! Ils rampent partout des murs aux plafonds fais attention si tu les vois le nid n'est jamais trop loin.
Et si tu entends une scie fuis et ne te retourne jamais.
dialogue-main-john-firstmeet7: Attends ! Avant de partir je te donne quelques bâtons et des silex
dialogue-main-john-fmresponse7: Au revoir M. et merci pour tout !
dialogue-main-john-main: Encore toi ? Allez ouste hors de chez moi !
